rows.title: Sort ArrayList of custom Objects by property

337: <p>You can use the <a href="http://tips4java.wordpress.com/2008/10/23/bean-comparator/" rel="noreferrer">Bean Comparator</a> to sort on any property in your custom class.</p>

<p>I have tried lots of different solutions available on internet but solution which works for me is available at below link.</p>

<p><a href="https://www.java67.com/2017/07/how-to-sort-arraylist-of-objects-using.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">https://www.java67.com/2017/07/how-to-sort-arraylist-of-objects-using.html</a></p>
